sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext} from 'react' import GuestContext from './../../context/guestContext/guestContext' import guestContext from './../../context/guestContext/guestContext' const GuestCounter = () => { const {guests} = useContext(guestContext) const totalInvited = guests.length const attending = guests.filter(guest => guest.isConfirmed) const totalAttending = attending.length const invitedByDiet = (type)=>guests.filter(guest => guest.dietary === type).length const attendingByDiet = (type)=>attending.filter(guest => guest.dietary === type).length return (
Guest Invited Attending
Non-Veg {invitedByDiet('Non-Vegan')} {attendingByDiet('Non-Vegan')}
Vegan {invitedByDiet('Vegan')} {attendingByDiet('Vegan')}
Pescitarians {invitedByDiet('pescitarian')} {attendingByDiet('pescitarian')}
Total {totalInvited} {totalAttending}
) } export default GuestCounter
